backend/main.mo: Motoko backend providing user profiles, score submission, progression tracking, and daily leaderboard logic with access control enforcement.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to related source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file for documentation or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme variable definitions and dark/light mode styling for the app.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/api/useLeaderboards.ts: React Query hooks for fetching daily and all‑time leaderboards from the backend actor.
frontend/src/api/useUserProfile.ts: React Query hooks for reading and updating the authenticated user's profile via the backend.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing game state transitions, profile setup flow, and theme/query providers.
frontend/src/auth/LoginButton.tsx: Button component handling Internet Identity login/logout and clearing React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/auth/ProfileSetupDialog.tsx: Modal dialog for first‑time users to submit a display name and create their profile.
frontend/src/components/GameHUD.tsx: Displays score, streak, coins, timer, and pause controls over the game view.
frontend/src/components/LeaderboardPanel: Shows daily and all‑time leaderboards with tabs, loading states, and close controls.
frontend/src/components/SettingsDialog.t: Provides UI for toggling sound, reduced motion, and editing key bindings.
frontend/src/game/audio/sfx.ts: Implements simple oscillator‑based hit, coin, and power‑up sound effects.
frontend/src/game/balance/difficulty.ts: Calculates time‑based difficulty scaling for obstacle speed, spawn rate, and score multiplier.
frontend/src/game/fx/particles.ts: Generates particle burst effects with randomized velocity and size.
frontend/src/game/fx/screenShake.ts: Returns screen‑shake intensity used during rendering.
frontend/src/game/GameCanvas.tsx: Sets up the game canvas, handles resizing and rendering loop, and connects game state updates.
frontend/src/game/gameTypes.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for all game entities, input state, and game state.
frontend/src/game/input/usePlayerInput.t: Tracks pointer and keyboard input to update normalized player target position.
frontend/src/game/renderer.ts: Renders the full game scene including player, obstacles, power‑ups, particles, background, and effects.
frontend/src/game/useGameLoop.ts: Implements the main game loop, handling time updates, spawning entities, movement, collisions, scoring, and game-over logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines mutations for submitting scores and unlocking perks using the backend actor, with leaderboard cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind layers, theme variables, fonts, and base styling for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/GameScreen.tsx: Renders the gameplay screen, controlling pause state, settings visibility, and passing event handlers to the canvas and HUD.
frontend/src/pages/LandingScreen.tsx: Displays the main menu with login, start game button, leaderboard, unlocks, and settings panels.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsScreen.tsx: Displays game results, awards coins, and auto-submits scores if authenticated, showing stats and restart/menu actions.
frontend/src/progression/perks.ts: Defines the Perk type and a list of available gameplay and cosmetic perks with costs and icons.
frontend/src/progression/UnlocksShop.tsx: Renders a shop UI where players can spend coins to unlock perks, handling affordability and unlock actions.
Manages player progression state in localStorage, including coins, best score, and unlocked perks with backend sync.
frontend/src/settings/settingsTypes.ts: Provides settings and keybinding interfaces along with default settings values.
frontend/src/settings/useSettings.ts: Loads, stores, and updates user settings in localStorage using a custom hook.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters with hash and query support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, including version info, overall game goals, required images, and a list of planned gameplay, UI, progression, and system features. Serves as a roadmap for building an arcade-style game with polish, progression, identity integration, and accessibility.
